messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] digestion.....:)
messages.msgSnippet: ... The fat.  Your gall bladder stored up bile, which helps digest fatty foods, and now you don t get that help.  I ve never been good with milk products, but
messages.messageBody:
> Tea doesn't do it, though. I'm thinking it's something in the hot chocolate
> mix that my gall bladder used to take care of and now that my gallbladder has
> gone to rest before me, things are somewhat different.

The fat. Your gall bladder stored up bile, which helps digest fatty foods,
and now you don't get that help. I've never been good with milk products,
but it's far worse since my gall bladder went away. If you want hot cocoa
without the medicinal effect ;) try making it yourself with 1T cocoa powder,
3T sugar, and SKIM milk. That's what my doctor suggested and it does work
for me.

brenda
